- 5 bosses.
- a personal music track for each enemy.





*A computer mouse is required to navigate the pause menu

item.title: Mika's Battle S
item.description:
About This Game

Mika's Battle S is a 2D platform action game based on the story of a warrior who has been commanded to defend Sunshineland territory against the attacks from the enemy soldiers belonging to the Rogho Corporation.

Mika, one of the best warriors of the Sunshineland which is famously known as the land of sunflowers, has been commanded to defend the Eastern border area of the territory while other members of the group were taking care of the Northern and Western Sunshineland border areas. Rogho Corporation is one of the Evil organizations which toppled the previous Government of Rogholand. They took full control over the territory of Rogholand and its people.

Since the Rogho Corporation took over the territory there have been reports of border clashes frequently. After a few months of coming to power, they went a bit too far by declaring a war against Sunshineland. So, the Sunshineland warriors, a group of five formidable female super soldiers, have been commanded by the leader of Sunshineland Army to fight against the intruders and to protect the territory at any cost. Rogho Corporation deployed the formidable human as well as robot warriors around the border areas. Moreover, the enemies took a few civilians as hostages. They started launching multiple missiles towards the Sunshineland territory which had reportedly destroyed some of the agricultural fields, a few buildings, and a few sunflower gardens. There were no reports of military or civilian casualties. Most of the civilians of the Sunshineland were taken to the underground Bomb shelters temporarily for their protection.

You play as Mika, one of the strongest Sunshineland warriors and your mission is to protect the Eastern border area of your territory and defeat the enemy forces while rescuing the civilians. Will you be able to accomplish your mission?

Key Features:

  • 15 Levels with stunning visuals!
  • Lots of formidable enemy soldiers having different kinds of weapons!
  • 2 Boss Battles!
  • Lots of deadly traps which includes saws, spikes etc.
  • 3 Firing modes which includes machine gun, laser and missile launcher modes!
  • Ability to double jump.
  • Collect items like health box, ammo, blue gems, crown etc.
  • Story Driven. Anime aesthetic, and animated cut-scenes!
  • Challenging situations!



Note: I am a solo game developer and I have done all of the graphics, artwork, character design, animation, programming except for the music. I hope you will enjoy the game.

item.title: Pinbot
item.description:
About This Game

Synopsis

Arks, mammoth interstellar vessels, usher hordes of Earth’s inhabitants away from the overpopulated confines of their homeworld, embarking on epic odysseys towards distant extrasolar colonies. These voyages span decades, with the colonists slumbering in cryogenic stasis, tended to by a myriad of machines. A diverse array of robots tirelessly manages everything from crafting essential commodities to constructing prospective settlements and safeguarding the colossal spacecraft.
Contrary to the vast cosmic emptiness previously assumed, the void is teeming with robotic entities that thrive on consuming metallic remnants—relics of vanished extraterrestrial civilizations. However, the arks are fortified with an intricate network of defense mechanisms, among which the most intriguing is the Pinbot. This enigmatic guardian combines curiosity and efficiency, embodying an unparalleled fusion of technology and artificial intelligence.

The game

Pinbot reimagines the timeless breakout game in an immersive 3D setting. Traditional brick formations now morph into incubators nurturing alien robots, demanding swift destruction! In this robotic realm, every element is mechanized—be it the player’s paddle, the antagonizing entities, or the enticing power-ups. Amidst the chaos, a series of relentless machines persist in their tasks, inevitably hindering your progress and adding an extra layer of challenge to your quest for dominance.
Embark on a journey through five distinct levels, each housing a series of rooms. Encounter a total of 53 unique rooms, each presenting its own set of challenges and surprises. To progress from one level to the next, conquer all rooms within that level in a single game. Brace yourself for a dynamic encounter where every aspect pulsates with robotic vitality, amplifying the thrill of the classic breakout concept.

item.title: Kitt's Quest
item.description:
About This Game

Take the role of Kitt, a young warrior fox, in a fight to save her land from the evil invaders! Kitt's Quest is a 3D platforming adventure where you must fight enemies, solve puzzles and defeat bosses to learn new powers, unlock costumes and discover new areas. Explore 6 worlds through over 20 levels, find the Soul Crystals to increase your health and spellpoints, unlock armor and staff sets that grant you upgrades like more health, stronger spells and more!

The Story


As a child, Kitt witnessed the invasion of her homeland, powerless, she was taken in by Cato, the village's old wizard. Cato took care of Kitt and taught her how to use magic spells. Now grown up and stronger, Kitt seeks to defeat the invaders and free her village.

item.title: Urban Chase
item.description:
About This Game

"Urban Chase" immerses players in a lively city chase between police and mischievous thieves. In this whimsical world, players take on the role of a police officer, engaging in thrilling pursuits to apprehend playful troublemakers.

Currently, players can exclusively experience the game from the perspective of a skillful police officer. Utilize your running skills to navigate the charming low-poly cityscape and apprehend the mischievous thieves who are up to playful antics.

Features:

Cute 3D Low Poly Graphics: Immerse yourself in a charming world with adorable characters and a visually appealing low-poly art style.



Diverse Stages: Thanks to the 12 stages that become progressively challenging and entertaining, there is no room for boredom.

Running and Capture: Chase down the mischievous thieves by showcasing your running skills, adding a dynamic element to the pursuit. Enhance your pursuit with boosters and handcuffs, special items designed to aid in the capture.

Playful Thieves: The thieves in "Urban Chase" are full of mischief, making each pursuit a delightful and unpredictable experience.

Single-player Focus: As of now, players can exclusively enjoy the game in single-player mode, taking on the role of the police officer.

"Urban Chase" offers a delightful and lighthearted experience as you dash through the city streets, chasing down playful thieves in this whimsical 3D low-poly world. Get ready for a charming adventure where cuteness meets crime-fighting fun!

item.title: The 257th Element
item.description:
About This Game

◇◇◇◇◇The 257th Element◇◇◇◇◇

SYNOPSIS

A time not too far from now. To find a solution for the food problem caused by a growing population, every country has been investing huge budgets into scientific research to increase every single mass with as limited time and energy as possible. As a result, new elements the 119th and beyond were discovered and created one after another, and finally, a genius scientist in Tokyo named Hikojuro Araki succeeded in creating the 256th element, Araraginium, which is a dreamy element that creates every being out of nothingness.
However, at the very moment when the first experiment in the world to create Araraginium just began, by an unexpected accident, it diffused all over Tokyo and disappeared.
A few days later, appalling incidents started happening all of a sudden, all-over Tokyo; people who were thought to be dead started emerging back to life as if they had never been dead, not even once. They all had a memory before their death, and actually, were those who passed away during the time period between the accident and 72 hours before that.
Due to their relevance with the accident, those people were called Araragi Human.
This story takes place several years after this in Tokyo…



＞＞＞Tokipedia

◇Shinsei Shonogamigakuen High School
The school where Tokimune and his friends go to. It has a conspicuous interior with contemporary and futuristic designs. There are classrooms, cafeteria, and rooftop where students can go. The rooftop is covered with futuristic invisible walls to prevent anyone from falling out, and a lot of students come and hang out there during lunch break.


◇The Island Where Dreams Come True
An island that has emerged in the Pacific Ocean out of nowhere after the Araraginium experiment and accident. It has become a tourist attraction as a miracle island. There are forests that look like mangrove jungles on this island, which offers a scenery that you rarely or never find in the coastal waters of Tokyo. Besides resort facilities, it also has camping facilities for students.


◇Cafe CHIENYAROU
A cafe where Tokimune and his friends go very often. You can play all the retro games and read all the manga books as much as you would like. It even has a space with a bowling alley. There is a Japanese-style space in this cafe, where you can enjoy its Japanese afternoon tea.


◇Araragi Human
People who passed away during the time period between the accident and 72 hours before the Araraginium experiment. They are just the same as normal human beings, except that they will disappear if no one (besides Araragi Humans) recognizes them. In other words, if no one sees them, they will disappear instantly.
Therefore, the government has installed and placed a small, invisible camera device for observation, so called “Invisible Watcher” on the majority of Araragi Humans. They are monitors 24x7 by the government’s monitoring organization (the Araragi Watcher) through footages sent from the device. This prevents Araragi Humans from disappearing.

◇“Elements” in this story
When we talk about “elements” in this story, it doesn’t mean an atom. “Element” is used as an abstract concept that contain properties. For example, Araraginium is not an atom that has 256 protons. Elements beyond the 200th are something completely different from atoms which are described by the number of protons and neutrons. Many of them are constituted by minuscule elements smaller than protons and invisible elements. To sum it up, those elements are called the Gaia elements. Detailed explanation about the Gaia elements is too hard to comprehend for high school students, so we will not touch on that in this story. Yet, it seems like Hamakado has got most of the idea. Therefore, if you are ever interested, we would recommend you ask her.

◇CAUTION
Streaming of this game and monetization of this game play videos are strictly prohibited.if you want to know more,please check our thread.

item.title: Beyond the Breach
item.description:
About This Game


Beyond The Breach is a 3D, sci-fi, single-player, first-person, narrative, puzzle where you as a player will take on the role of an AI robot who is undergoing a seemingly ordinary test in a dystopian world, only to realize that you exist in a society where they mistreat robots who defy their rules. This leads you to become a deviant robot who will gain special abilities like detecting electrical energy, hacking into scientists, and controlling them to aid your escape. Your mission is to break free from this oppressive environment and rescue other robots like yourself who are also imprisoned. The game combines stealth and puzzle gameplay, presenting players with the challenge of escaping from society while also giving them the responsibility to save other robots.

item.title: RplGen Studio
item.description:
About This Software

RplGenStudio is a specialized video production software designed for creating videos similar to galgames, tabletop game replays, and audio-visual novels.

These types of videos are characterized by their fixed structure and lengthy duration, which means that using traditional video editing software to create them would involve a tremendous amount of repetitive work. As a result, RplGenStudio was developed. RplGenStudio was primarily designed to assist content creators in crafting their video stories as easily as writing a document, allowing them to dedicate more of their energy to the creation of visuals and content rather than getting bogged down in the intricate and tedious process of video editing.

Why choose RplGenStudio?

1. Maximum Customization: Unlike conventional tabletop game replay video production software, RplGenStudio allows users to highly customize their visuals. In addition to the typical combination of character illustrations and speech bubble frames, it also supports chat window-style performances resembling instant messaging apps. All visual elements can be freely moved and configured with transition animations and text effects, maximizing design flexibility. RplGenStudio also includes practical dice rolling and hit point animations, with plans for future updates to cater to various tabletop game replay video needs.

2. Professional Exporting: RplGenStudio supports built-in MP4 video export, eliminating the need for screen recording software and the hassle of replaying the performance for preview. This ensures stable video quality without stuttering or dropped frames, even on less powerful computers. On high-performance computers, NVIDIA GPU hardware acceleration can be utilized for faster video exporting, minimizing waiting time. To meet the needs of professional video creators, RplGenStudio not only exports MP4 videos but also offers the option to export scripts as XML project files compatible with Adobe Premiere Pro. The project files retain separate layers and tracks, allowing for customized post-production effects.

3. Efficient Project Management: RplGenStudio provides a systematic project management mode, supporting batch import and manipulation of images, audio, and font media. Users can easily transfer projects to other disks or computers and continue editing seamlessly, greatly optimizing the experience of collaborative editing.

4. Rich Text-to-Speech Sources: RplGenStudio integrates over 200 text-to-speech voice sources from multiple services, along with system-embedded voices and typewriter sound effects that can be used offline. This ensures a wide range of audio options to fulfill users' audio requirements in video production.

5. User-Friendly Interface: In the Project View of RplGenStudio, most functions offer convenient keyboard shortcuts, including but not limited to save, copy, paste, find, replace, delete, and sort operations. With abundant audio and video features, the script editing process is straightforward and user-friendly. The built-in script editor in RplGenStudio 2.0 provides professional text editing capabilities. All commands related to parameter settings, character selection, and media switching can be auto-completed using the text suggestion engine of the script editor, allowing users to focus on their storytelling.

item.title: Altitude's Toll
item.description:

Introduction

item.title: Ice Land
item.description:
About This Game

This is a game centered around surviving in a harsh, cold environment, offering you the ultimate test of survival.

In the game, you will tackle the following primary tasks:
Mining and logging: Gather resources to sustain survival and craft various items using these materials to create a habitable environment.
Crop cultivation: Cultivate crops in adverse conditions to meet food requirements.
Animal husbandry: Acquire additional food and resources through animal breeding.
Recruiting NPCs: Employ assistants to help you complete various tasks and work.

You will need to carefully modify the environment, using a heating system to ensure a comfortable living environment for both yourself and the NPCs. However, you must also be mindful of the pollution generated by the heating system to maintain a delicate balance.

Additionally, the game provides main storyline missions to guide you to explore the game world more deeply, but these missions are not mandatory.

The game offers both single-player mode and local network multiplayer mode, enabling you to cooperate with friends to face the challenges of this cold world together and create even more excitement and enjoyment.

item.title: God's Plan
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Purgatory!

- This bluish, ice-cold realm lies between hell and heaven, where souls become trapped awaiting their final judgment. You will wander through this maze until you have endured enough suffering.




- You are not alone in this place. Your memories are almost real, but somehow not as you remember them. Other suffering souls accompany you through this journey—souls that you may have harmed, perhaps.




- There are four levels, each with a painting inside, each corresponding to the curse applied to you. Each painting reveals fragments of the story; however, it is your imagination that will bring it to life. Keep an eye out for Easter eggs, as they can help you build it up.




- Some levels require you to find objects to proceed, but you will encounter obstacles along the way.




The sundered world is neither above or under us, it's inside our minds.

It's us who choose it, even if it's called God's Plan...

item.description:

item.title: BOD-1
item.description:
About This Game

Exploration and Survival: Players will explore their home, which has become a trap between worlds, and search for ways to escape this nightmare.
Puzzles and Riddles: Unravel the secrets of the otherworldly realm by solving various puzzles and riddles that stand in the way of salvation.

item.title: A fascinating story : Wedding Night
item.description:
About This Game

Game background

This is just a story that happened in the past. It has long passed now, but it really happened. It is a story that changed Do Yeon’s life.
She once had a very smooth life, a delicate and pleasant appearance, a financially superior family background, and a decent job. No, she just successfully arrested the most difficult criminal this month, perfectly breaking the rumors. It's a pity that she chose to marry her subordinate when she was about to be promoted.
However, they have been in love for many years and their relationship is very stable.
And tonight was their wedding night's carnival party~ Of course she wouldn't miss it, so she dressed up and went with her husband.
But no one expected that the two policemen would be retaliated by their enemies... It was difficult for her to fight with her four fists. On this night, she was about to spend the darkest night in her life...

Gameplay

This is a very simple card flip game where you turn over a card and then try to find another card that matches it.
You only need to click on the card to find the same card as the image that appears, and the identical ones will be eliminated. After all the cards are eliminated, the heroine's story can be unlocked...

item.title: Last of the Noticers
item.description:
About This Game

For the past few years, you've noticed things, things about life, things about others, things about the world and about geopolitics. And none of it is adding up. Today, you woke up and decided to do something about it. Or will you?

Choose the path you will take during this non-linear FPS

- Walk through life as a good little NPC, interacting with your fellow NPCs along the way, and avoid succumbing to the monotony of it all

OR

- Reach into your bag and become the main character for a change

DURING THE ADVENTURE:

- Liquidate any denizen or fed that gives you trouble

- Generate as much (or as little) social credit as possible to justify your rating as a person

- Unlock weapons with different effects depending upon your social credit score

- Partake in the use of inhalants to ensure today's adventure is as long and as amusing as you want it to be

How will you spend this day you woke up to?

item.title: Sling Puzzle: Golf Master
item.description:
About This Game

Have you ever imagined what happens to the world when gravity is not always downward? In an inverted city, you will walk over walls and fall into the sky. Space is no longer limited to flat ground and the movement of things will become truly different. This game constructs a special gravity space. In the game, you will explore in the intricate gravity space, discover golf like movement, break the traps, solve the puzzles, and discover the path to the end.

Roll your character through a maze of challenges, solving puzzles to reach the finish point. Precision and wit will be your allies on this exhilarating rolling adventure!


Crash into the pyramid of cans for a smashing good time in our puzzle arcade game. Roll your way to bonus points as you skillfully break down the pyramid and conquer the challenge!


Roll with precision and master the art of timing to overcome the sophisticated obstacles that lie ahead. Only the most skillful players will conquer this thrilling and demanding test of wit and reflexes!


Take careful aim to hit the pyramid of cans, breaking it with finesse. Show off your accuracy and puzzle-solving prowess in this exhilarating level!

Game Features:

  • Exquisitely designed levels
  • Hundreds of mind-blowing puzzles with hidden paths and well-designed traps
  • Nice and simple sling game, golf mechanics
  • 100% real physics
  • Collect and upgrade various characters and trails
  • Three different game modes
  • Level mode: reach the final point of each level within a limited number of moves
  • Capture mode: no limit on the number of moves, you need to capture all chickens in the shortest time
  • Treasure mode: discover and collect the hidden treasures in the level
  • Comfortable and relaxing music and sound
  • Easy to control, golf mechanics, fun to play

item.title: Aim Trainer - Shooting Range
item.description:
About This Game

Aim Trainer - Shooting Range is a casual shooting game that includes a variety of exciting and fun game modes and a extensive weapon upgrade system. Train your shooting skills, collect different types of weapons, and become an excellent shooter elite!

Experience the thrill of precision marksmanship, hone your shooting skills, aim for perfection, and hit your targets dead center!


Step into the great outdoors and embrace the explosive power of the shotgun!


Prepare for long-range dominance as you venture into the open expanse of our virtual world!


Embark on an epic hunting adventure in the wild, where time slows down as your bullet sails towards your prey!


Get ready for heart-pounding shotgun action in the great outdoors. Your first shot may miss, but the second shot is right on target!


Step into the dimly lit indoor shooting range and test your reflexes as glass bottles pop up one by one!

Game features:


  • Abundant task levels: Train and improve your shooting skills step by step!
  • Various of weapons: Different kinds of weapons bring different shooting experiences! Upgrade your weapons to get more powerful equipment!
  • Realistic shooting experience: Physics-based shooting simulation that recreates a real-world, authentic shooting experience!
  • Multiple game modes: Contains training levels, clay pigeon shooting, hunting, and other game modes, a variety of different shooting scenarios simulation!
  • Hunting mode: Realistic hunting scenario simulation, conquer the wild animals in the forest with a sniper rifle!
  • Offline Games: Play a few rounds anywhere, anytime!

The game mainly trains three types of weapons: pistols, shotguns, and sniper rifles.
Pistol - Train the reaction speed, aiming speed, and the rapid-fire ability for close-range shooting.
Shotgun - Training accuracy and speed of aiming at medium distance.
Sniper - Training ultra-long-range shooting accuracy and aiming ability.

Skeet Shooting and Trap Shooting: Simulate skeet shooting to train your reaction speed and shooting accuracy.
Hunting Mode: Realistic simulation of the forest ecological environment, animals will avoid each other, attack, foraging. You use a sniper rifle to survive in the forest, the longer you survive, the more rare species you will encounter and the more difficult challenges you will face. Try to survive in the forest to the end!

Come and download the game, train your shooting skills and experience the realistic shooting environment!

item.title: Death Motel
item.description:
About This Game

I'm Joe Salinger, a dedicated paranormal investigator. I couldn't resist delving into the rumors circulating about ghostly sightings at Crimson Motel.

The unsettling news revolves around a chilling incident from several months ago: a maniacal psychopath brutally murdered two teenagers within the hotel's walls.

In response, the management abruptly shut down the motel, citing "renovations" as a cover.

During the supposed renovations, a wave of eerie occurrences unfolded. Construction workers reported encountering apparitions, and some even suffered severe mental distress, compelling them to abandon their work at the site.

The enigma shrouding Crimson Motel piqued my curiosity; it's precisely the kind of mystery I thrive on.

Armed with my investigative prowess, I am determined to gather concrete evidence within the hotel's haunting confines. Backed by my comprehensive computer setup in the van, I will meticulously process all the information I collect. My ultimate goal is to capture undeniable proof of these spectral entities on video camera.

If I manage to record any ghostly apparitions, that would be my invaluable contribution to unraveling the secrets veiled within the Crimson Motel.

*Short, can be completed under 1 hour.
*Has running key, you can run around fast, although we suggest you walk around and explore the background story.
*Solve simple puzzles using your inventory and your equipment in the back of your van.
*Collect evidences regarding the paranormal events of this Motel.
*Hunt down ghost sightings.
*Has jumpscares.
*Ominous background music and soundscapes.

item.title: MP / Maya Prophecy
item.description:
About This Game

The world view is derived from the parallel timeline of a personal novel.

In a parallel timeline in 2012, the Maya Prophecy of the world's end came true, not due to meteorites or floods, but because a small number of humans awakened superpowers. These abilities were potent enough to shake the entire world, leading to a war between the awakened, referred to as the "New Human," and the non-awakened, known as the "Old Human," sparking a global conflict.

The game emphasizes challenging battles, with every fight, except the first one, being winnable. If unable to win, players can study tactics for improvement. JP points earned from defeating monsters can be used to enhance character attributes.

Speed is crucial in the game, as having a lower speed may result in enemies taking action twice. Additionally, there is an equipment enhancement system where scrolls for strengthening attributes can be acquired through battles or purchased from shops. Equipment can be strengthened in the menu, but this decision is irreversible.

The current version of the game features only six playable characters, with three starting characters and the others joining after battles.


Game Features:

●Each boss battle presents a high level of difficulty.
●Diverse skills can be obtained through battles or by purchasing skill books from the shop.
●There is no limit to the attributes of all characters.
●The unique JP system allows self-enhancement through battle rewards.
●Various abnormal states add challenge to battles.
●Equipment enhancement system.

item.title: Super RPS
item.description:
About This Game

Super RPS is a tactical strategy game in which two players have a series of Rock, Paper, Scissors matches on 5 fields concurrently. Each player has a secondary deck of "Field Cards" that have special abilities that can turn the match in your favor.


Join the official BlueExabyte Discord and YouTube, linked both in game, as well as in the links to the right!


  • Online Multiplayer (1v1) play against your friends on Steam or against random players online!
  • Offline VS Bot - sharpen your skills against the bot with the scariest Artificial Intelligence: randomization
  • Strategize to beat players, select the best combo to outsmart your opponents and win
  • Customization colors to change the mood of the game
  • In game chat to talk to your friends while you play


  • Rock++ - Rock beats Paper and Scissors
  • Paper++ - Paper beats Rock and Scissors
  • Scissors++ - Scissors beats Rock and Paper
  • Rock-- - Rock loses to Paper and Scissors
  • Paper-- - Paper loses to Rock and Scissors
  • Scissors-- - Scissors loses to Rock and Paper
  • Reverse - Cards have reverse win conditions (i.e. Paper beats Scissors)
  • Equal Balance - The match on this field results in an automatic draw
  • Ultimate Draw - If there is a draw in this match, the Player who owns the field wins (CPU results in normal draw), other conditions are normal
  • Scapegoat - Auto draw, but points will randomly be assigned to a match on the field
  • Shuffle - The enemy's RPS card will be switched with another of theirs
  • Dud - No field effect
